description: This file defines application routing logic for a Flutter app, including route names, route generation method, and a fallback 'Page not found' widget.

classes.name: _NotFoundPage
classes.description: A widget that displays a 'Page not found' message when an unrecognized route is accessed.

methods.name: onGenerateRoute
methods.description: Generates routes based on the given RouteSettings, returning a MaterialPageRoute to appropriate pages or a not-found page.
